Project.name: StopWatch Demo for Haxe
Project.Description: This demo illustrates the use of the StateMachine Utility to define and navigate the states of a Finite State Machine or FSM of a working StopWatch. Xinf is used for the user interface.
Project.ReleaseNotes: Features in Version 1.0 * A port of the StopWatch Demo for ActionScript 3 * Standard and MultiCore versions are included. * Uses the PureMVC / Haxe StateMachine Utility * Xinf is used for the user interface.
Project.Installation: Installing the Project Source Code From the archive * Download the latest source code archive. * Unzip the source code zip to any folder on your disk. For instance: c:\development\ * You will see a StopWatch_X_Y (where X_Y is version) source folder. For instance: c:\development\StopWatch_X_Y From the Repository * Use your favorite SVN client to retrieve the latest source code release from the repository.
